title: anonymousminer
author: anonymousminer
content: Up for auction today we have several lots of BitcoinPenny items.Some are rare and some are common, but it's always a good time to pick up any items you may have missed.*Please read the auction rules below as there are some changes, most notable, there will NOT be a snipe rule this auction*Lot 1 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 silver Voskcoin Edition 2019 - Graded MS70PL (only voskcoin edition known to be a 70) - Special Edition Doodle featuring Tails Vosk, velvet pouch and COA includedStarting bid: 0.00100BTCLot 2 - BitcoinPenny / Mantis Cryptos Short Roll 2018 (20 coins)Starting bid: 0.00100BTCLot 3 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 Silver 2019 - Right facing eagle - velvet pouch includedStarting bid: 0.00050BTCLot 4 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2015 - CJB mint markStarting bid: 0.00005BTCLot 5 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2018 - DSC mint mark (Dallas Super Conference Coin)Starting bid: 0.00005BTCLot 6 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 Silver 2018 - Graded MS69PLStarting bid: 0.00075BTCLot 7 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2020 - Graded MS65+ PL - MGHB mint markStarting bid: 0.00025BTCLot 8 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2019 - AMD mint mark - comes in original sales sleeveStarting bid: 0.00005BTCLot 9 - BitcoinPenny Copper DIY Penny 2020 - MGHB mint mark - comes in original sales sleeve with 4 DIY hologramsStarting bid: 0.00005BTCLot 10 - BitcoinPenny Red White and Blue adjustable baseball hat - never wornStarting bid: 0.00025BTCLot 11 - BitcoinPenny Navy winter hat - never wornStarting bid: 0.00025BTC**Added BONUSES**The highest bid will get a free Copper Zepher commemorative BitcoinPenny AND an "invisible" BitcoinPennyThe second hightest bid will get a free Copper Zepher commemorative BitcoinPennyThe third highest bid will get a free "invisible" BitcoinPennyLIST OF LOTS FOR EASIER BIDDING:Lot 1 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 silver Voskcoin Edition 2019 - Graded MS70PLLot 2 - BitcoinPenny / Mantis Cryptos Short Roll 2018 (20 coins)Lot 3 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 Silver 2019 - Right facing eagle Lot 4 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2015 - CJB mint markLot 5 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2018 - DSC mint mark (Dallas Super Conference Coin)Lot 6 - BitcoinPenny 0.999 Silver 2018 - Graded MS69PLLot 7 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2020 - Graded MS65+ PL - MGHB mint markLot 8 - BitcoinPenny Copper Penny 2019 - AMD mint markLot 9 - BitcoinPenny Copper DIY Penny 2020 - MGHB mint markLot 10 - BitcoinPenny Red White and Blue adjustable baseball hatLot 11 - BitcoinPenny Navy winter hatSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.00005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 5 decimal places**END TIME: December 4th 2023 16:00EST (4PM New York Time)**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**NO SNIPE RULE! Highest bid placed before the end time gets the item!PAYMENT: PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qlylhtyh3q0chdf6e4qa87u9647ddxmxcge0f0vLN and LTC also accepted due to high fees on the BTC networkSHIPPING: ALL items will be sent to minerjones for reshipping.OWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
